title: Understanding Risk Factors
text: Consider the various social and personal factors that can contribute to anger, violence, and abuse. Think about situations that might increase stress or create tension.

title: Social and Environmental Influences
text: Reflect on how social environments and relationships can impact an individual's behavior. What kind of social dynamics might lead to increased aggression?

hintAnswer: stress, experiencing abuse, unfairness, strained relationships, disparities in access to care, families and communities
title: Identifying Stressors
text: List some common stressors that might lead to anger or violence.
